methods.javadoc:
Get the currently running thread.
@return null if no thread is running.
methods.name: getCurrentThread

return.comment: null if no thread is running.

methods.javadoc: Blocks until the current task completes.
methods.name: waitForCurrentTask
methods.comment: Blocks until the current task completes.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if this task scheduler is in the process of running a task or has a pending
 task.
@return true if this task scheduler is in the process of running a task or has a pending
 task.
methods.name: isBusy
methods.comment:
Returns true if this task scheduler is in the process of running a task or has a pending
 task.

return.comment:
true if this task scheduler is in the process of running a task or has a pending
 task.

name: TaskScheduler
